structure.unit: A JUSTICE AND PUBLIC SAFETY CABINET

law.catch_line: Office of Secretary to serve as state planning agency for federal Crime Control and Safe Streets Act.
law.text: The Office of Secretary of Justice and Public Safety shall serve as the state planning agency for purposes of compliance with the federal Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968, as amended, or subsequently adopted federal criminal justice legislation.
law.history: Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 43, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 218, sec. 4, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 343, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 155, sec. 14, effective June 17, 1978. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. V, sec. 7.
